text: Hagi Israeli vahe'mo'za knare'zama huno hageteno rama'a ragama renentea wainigna hu'naze. Hianagi zamagra rama'a fenoza nente'za ante'za havi anumzante'ma kresramna vunte ita rama'a tro hu'naze. Hagi rama'a ne'za mopafintira nehamare'za, havi anumzama mono'ma hunentaza havemofonena rama'a avasase'zana hunentaze.
